title: Contacting The World
name: Contacting The World

properties.name: Amanda McColl (YOUNG Co.)
properties.description: Posted by TagtheatreI live in Cardonald, Glasgow. I study HNC Acting and Performing, in Reid Kerr College in Paisley. AGE: 18 MY FAVOURITE THING IN THE WHOLE WORLD IS: Music MY DREAM COLLABORATOR IS: Sylvia Plath, she is a great poet. I love her work and I would like work with her to be able to learn from her to write like her. MY DREAM DESTINATION IS: Assisi Italy. My favourite poem called Assisi. It describes a cathedral and it sound really beautiful which made me wanna go and visit it.

properties.name: Anna Devitt (YOUNG Co.)
properties.description: Posted by TagtheatreI grew up in Shawlands South Side Glasgow and Moved to Erskine, my first memory of moving here was I drove by real cows in a field which is something you don\'t often see in the City! AGE: 19 MY FAVOURITE THING IN THE WHOLE WORLD IS: When the sky is black and you can see every single star. MY DREAM COLLABORATOR IS: Mr Billy Connelly as I would love to do a comedy tour with him and have a shot of his wee motorbike!! MY DREAM DESTINATION IS: The Moon, I have always wanted to go and stand up there and sing as loud as I can knowing no one could complain!!

properties.name: Citizens' Theatre (our home)
properties.description: Posted by Tagtheatre This is where we work! TAG Theatre Company started at the Citizens\' Theatre, way back in 1967. TAG and Citizens\' now produce work for both main stage and studio audiences; touring theatre aimed primarily at children and young people for schools and venues across Scotland; a diverse range of workshops and participatory projects; an education & outreach programme tailored specifically to serve the local community; along with a Community Company and a YOUNG Co.! We have three theatre spaces and loads of events, so if you haven\'t been before, come and see us! The Citizens Theatre has a bar, coffee bar and free car park. (Photos by Iain G. Farrell.)

properties.name: Eve Nicol (YOUNG Co.)
properties.description: Posted by TagtheatreI\'ve lived in the same square mile all my life and am looking forward to exploring as I move to England to continue my studies. AGE: 20 MY FAVOURITE THING IN THE WHOLE WORLD IS: Face painting, dressing up and baking biscuits - all at the same time! MY DREAM COLLABORATOR IS: Anyone who is madly, wildly, crazily passionate about what they do, no matter what it is. MY DREAM DESTINATION IS: Somewhere very cold but bright and sunny where I\'d have to wear a big jacket and boots and can see my breath.

properties.name: Fouad Saminy (YOUNG Co.)
properties.description: Posted by TagtheatreI was born in Afghanistan came to UK 7 years ago and living in Glasgow. I am studying to become a Doctor. Joined YOUNG Co. to have taste on acting and I am really enjoying it and thanks to the people in there, they made the environment quite easy for me... Thanks dudes and dudettes... AGE: 20 MY FAVOURITE THING IN THE WHOLE WORLD IS: Hmmm... Food? or is it cliché. MY DREAM COLLABORATOR IS: For me it is collaborators, Johnny Depp because he is really good at what he does, I mean there is a lot to learn from him, not acting wise, but determination and focus, he gives all of what he has got to what he does. Steven Spielberg because I would like to able to see everything from different angles like he does. I mean he has got his signature on what he does, an un-seeable signature. MY DREAM DESTINATION IS: Again plural for me, Pyramids to study how people managed to built it when there wasn’t a manageable power to do it in those days and Eiffel Tower because it is romantic (I think).

properties.name: Gemma McGinley (YOUNG Co.)
properties.description: Posted by TagtheatreI am from Glasgow have lived there for 19 years and I am currently studying acting at Reid Kerr college. AGE: 19 MY FAVOURITE THING IN THE WORLD IS: A picture of my gran and granda because I never got to meet my gran but she’s part of my family. MY DREAM COLLABORATOR IS: Adam Sandler - so I could see his progress in creating all his different characters in his films and to see a day in the live of him. MY DREAM DESTINATION IS: Salou (Spain) as that was my first ever time abroad and it was with my family.

properties.name: Helen Black (TAG/YOUNG Co. Web Geek)
properties.description: Posted by TagtheatreI was born in Belfast and moved to Scotland to study at Strathclyde in 1996. I stayed in Glasgow when I started working and am very settled. I love being so close to the mountains. Scotland has such a huge amount of great countryside to explore. I work as Marketing & Projects Officer for TAG (which is part of the Citizens’). I’m the geek who puts together this web stuff! AGE: 31 (in early July) MY FAVOURITE THING IN THE WHOLE WORLD IS: I wrote this question, but now that I have to answer it, it’s really hard! I love taking photos, rock climbing, exploring mountains, my bloke and our cat Flo. I guess my favourite thing is being happy! MY DREAM COLLABORATOR IS: Not an individual but a group…The Band! If only I’d lived earlier (and had a significant singing talent) then I could have been one of their amazing guests in their last concert “The Last Waltz”. If you haven’t seen it, check it out. MY DREAM DESTINATION IS: San Francisco. It’s probably my favourite place I’ve been to. So many different areas to visit, each with a totally unique atmosphere. It also looks awesome…lots to photograph. Now that I think of it, it’s also where “The Last Waltz” was filmed. Perfect.

properties.name: Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum
properties.description: Posted by Tagtheatre We took a group from the Citizens\' YOUNG Co. to Kelvingrove to meet conservators Polly Smith and Lorraine Maule who are working on the restoration of a painting.

properties.name: Martin Haddow (YOUNG Co.)
properties.description: Posted by TagtheatreI was born in Paisley but am now living in Johnstone. Performing Arts student - approaching my honours year. AGE: 20 MY FAVOURITE THING IN THE WHOLE WORLD IS: Art and Expression MY DREAM COLLABORATOR IS: It would have to be Johnny Depp, he is such a chameleon in performing and a massive role model for myself. MY DREAM DESTINATION IS: Barcelona. It has it all, theatre, music, football, passion.

properties.name: Michael Burns (YOUNG Co.)
properties.description: Posted by TagtheatreI\'m from Glasgow, study French and German and I enjoy dramatic enterprises in my spare time. AGE: 20 MY FAVOURITE THING IN THE WHOLE WORLD IS: A hot bath with Radox and a good book. MY DREAM COLLABORATOR IS: Mathieu Kassovitz (French actor and director, most famously directed "La Haine" and starred in "Le Fabuleux destin d\'Amélie Poulain"). I feel we share a lot of idiosyncracies. MY DREAM DESTINATION IS: Red Square, Moscow - so inspirational.

properties.name: Neil Packham (YOUNG Co. Director)
properties.description: Posted by TagtheatreI have been living in Glasgow for 18 years but am originally from London. I trained in London as an actor, performed in theatre, TV, film and radio. Became involved in community drama and young people’s theatre not long after my move to Scotland. I have worked at the Citizens’ Theatre for nearly 6 years and I am the director of YOUNG Co. I live with my partner Linda and my children Alfie 7 and Sam 13. AGE: 46 MY FAVOURITE THING IN THE WHOLE WORLD IS: obviously my family but I’m also really keen on sticky toffee pudding and ice-cream! MY DREAM COLLABORATOR: would be Peter Brooke the famous theatre director. I was lucky enough to see his production of the Mahabharata in 1990 when Glasgow was European City of Culture. It is the story of the Hindu religion, told in 9 hours, it completely blew me away. I think it was the first truly multi-cultural piece of theatre I had seen, it told a great story full of humanity, humour and more theatre spectacle than I believe I will ever see again. MY DREAM DESTINATION IS: …hard, there are too many places I haven’t seen and want to. As a child I always dreamed of diving off the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, I would still like to do this although fear for its destruction from tourism. I’d also like to travel across India. I love travel programmes.

properties.name: Steven McLeish (YOUNG Co.)
properties.description: Posted by TagtheatreI live in small town, Kilwinning and I have just finished college (HND Acting & performance) and now I am an actor looking for work. AGE:19 MY FAVOURITE THING IN THE WHOLE WORLD IS: Acting, my friend, girlfriend and my family and having fun MY DREAM COLLABORATOR IS: Would be James Cagney because he is an amazing actor and I would like to learn how he got so good. MY DREAM DESTINATION IS: Hollywood cause I think I would like the lifestyle and would love to work as a actor there.
